Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Pictograph \Pic"to*graph\, n. [See {Picture}, and {-graph}.] A picture or hieroglyph representing and expressing an idea. -- {Pic`to*graph"ic}, a. [1913 Webster]
pictographic adj : consisting of or characterized by the use of pictographs; "a pictographic script"; "pictographic stage in the development of writing"
